title: The 'Maharani' Diamond & Emerald Haar with Pearl Drops
materials: meticulously crafted with high-quality diamonds (VS clarity
G color). Features vibrant emeralds and lustrous South Sea Pearls. Finished with a signature Hyderabadi polish for enduring shine.
features: An opulent statement piece showcasing intricate diamond floral motifs throughout the 'haar'. Elegant emerald accents provide a striking contrast. Suspended pearls add a touch of traditional charm. The central pendant features a matching diamond and emerald design, echoing the necklace's overall aesthetic. Masterfully crafted with delicate openwork, embodying the richness of South Indian artistry.
colors: accented with vibrant green (emeralds) and soft white (pearls). The combination creates a regal and timeless color palette.
occasions: and special occasions demanding a majestic statement. Ideal for Seemantham or Half-Saree ceremonies where a touch of heritage is desired.
description: This 'Maharani' Haar is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry tradition. The dazzling diamonds, combined with the vibrant emeralds and lustrous pearls, exude opulence and sophistication. Meticulously handcrafted for durability and lasting beauty, it's an heirloom piece to be cherished for generations. A symbol of prosperity and grace, perfect for the modern bride who appreciates timeless elegance.
